name: A tale of blue witch
description:
A blue witch is traveling all over the world.

One night,  villagers came to meet her.

And they asked her to help them.

Defeating enemies, you can level up.

How to play 

↑↓→←　up,  down,  right,  left

Z   attack

↓　＋　Z　under attack

X   dash (During dash, enemies are no damage.)

C  magic  (press C  for 0.5 seconds)

space      jump

Esc     pause 

          continue

           quit  

Or  Xbox controller        gamepad

※Before you press continue button you must touch save point at first.
